ygData.subject: Another on Rodcet now ...
ygData.msgSnippet: I m alive! And after Brell, and a break from EQ, then Luclin .. I moved to Rodcet last night with a friend from Luclin., who s already introduced himself ;) So
ygData.messageBody:
I'm alive!

And after Brell, and a break from EQ, then Luclin .. I moved to Rodcet last
night with a friend from Luclin., who's already introduced himself ;)

So I should do the info thing:

First Name: Lora
Age: 36 - do I have to!!
Location: Raleigh NC (waves at David - the snow finally metled! now if
it will just stop raining)
Gender: female
Home Page: don't have one really .. assorted junk at
www.mindspring.com/~loraroa
Status: Married, kids -- err kids yes -- I'm *ACK* straight! - but
for those that missed my intro - I
was effectively raised by two "uncles" after my
(abusive) father's death when I was young .. I
owe my choice of career to one (and he helped put me
thru college) and my choice of hobbies to
the other. And I knew and accepted thier relat. in a
way I think only young children do - it simply
always was. They were my family .. and the only
stable, kind, loving non-abusive males in my
life as a child. And they weren't even really uncles
.. just neighbors who helped two kids
(my brother too) after thier dad died .. and took it
on themselves.
Main Character: Hechicera (spanish for Enchatress) Enchantress on RN
Lisha (the darkness before midnight) DE SK on
RN
Redowl Barb Shaman on RN
all started yesterday levels 4, 3, 1 this
second
my main on Luclin was a Bard .. got fairly
high
my mains on Brell were warrior and wiz
started life right after beta on Karana as a
Rogue (they were really broken then)
Most Hated EQ Monster: spiderlings! they are a plague.
Favorite EQ Monster: Frontier Mountain giants .. the biggest "pet" I've
ever had! (as Bard - seemed to be easy to charm)
Fav. TV Show: ick TV ;)
Fav. Author: most SF / Fantasy .. Andre Norton & Isaac Asimov are the two I
blame for starting me in the genre's as a child
non-EQ hobbies: Well, until my congenital defects got bad enough to become
a disability .. I used to train horses for
"High School" .. not just dressage and some jumping ..as well as breed them.
I used to work too .. as two different kinds of an Engineer and then as a
high-tech web geek type. Now I mainly do my PT exercises as a forced hobby,
and stick to smaller
animals (dogs and trying out hamsters now).

- Lora
